import React, { Component } from 'react' //CUSTOM CSS import "./style.css"; import { Row } from "../Grid"; //TOP SECTION NAVBAR import Nav from "../Nav"; //MAIN CONTENT COMPONENTS import Home from "../Home"; import AllConfigs from "../AllConfigs"; import Mode from "../Mode" import UserSettings from "../UserSettings" import DeviceSettings from "../DeviceSettings" import Osiris from "../OsirisIP" import LogOut from "../LogOut" import ForwardConfigArea from "../ForwardConfigArea" import ModemConfig from "../ModemConfig" import NetworkConfig from "../NetworkConfigArea" //BOOTSTRAP AND SEMANTIC import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import { Menu } from 'semantic-ui-react' //SWITCH ROUTING import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Redirect, Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; export default class MenuExampleHeaderVertical extends Component { state = {} handleItemClick = (e, { name }) => this.setState({ activeItem: name }); render() { const { activeItem } = this.state return (
{/*//////////////////// BEGINNING OF NAVBAR ////////////////////*/}
Home System Config Forward Config Modem Config Network Config Mode Admin User Settings Osiris IP Log Out
{/* */} {/*//////////////////// END OF NAVBAR ////////////////////*/} {/*////////// v PUT COMPONENTS HERE v ////////// */} {/*COMPONENT*/} {/*COMPONENT*/} {/*COMPONENT*/} {/*COMPONENT*/} {/*COMPONENT*/} {/*COMPONENT*/} {/*COMPONENT*/} {/*COMPONENT*/}
) } }
